column3: Should fix #13581. @stacepellegrino are you up for building this branch?
Alternatively we could include cstring all the time and drop the extern definition for memcpy.\n/cc @theuni 679240d0e9
Closing this since I'm doubting #13581 now.
Yes, this is not correct. We're attempting to replace memcpy, so including cstring is not the right thing to do. I'll comment further on #13581.
